segments.text: I'm terrified looking at this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down, pooling on the slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the plate has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the two-step stool is in real peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back, and he's stretched so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One slip, and cookies will fly everywhere as he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below waits eagerly, unaware of the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he drops, she might get hurt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's light highlights every dangerous detail.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is safe, but inside it's a nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears and broken bones.
segments.speaker: PAR
